Package problem

Class Matrix<T>

java.lang.Object
problem.Matrix<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of elements in the matrix (e.g. Double, Integer, etc.)
Direct Known Subclasses:
IntegerMatrix
public abstract class Matrix<T> extends Object
This class represents a matrix of elements. It supports different types of matrices:

- Single number matrix: a matrix with a single element.

- Vector matrix: a matrix with a single row or a single column.

- Matrix matrix: a matrix with multiple rows and columns.
